messages.subject: Website update
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have been promising to update my website and I finally did.  Just to give some indication, I last had 37 tsuba listed, I now have 53, menuki are
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I have been promising to update my website and I finally did. Just to give some indication, I last had 37 tsuba listed, I now have 53, menuki are around 25. Fuchi kashira and kozuka are also upgraded. I appreciate all comments and even better more sales leads!! Thank you for looking. http://www.freewebs.com/kamakiriken/index.htm

Ken aka "The Mantis Dude"
